code: example_loripsum <-   lipsum_loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Ut bacillum aliud est inflexum et incurvatum de industria, aliud ita natum, sic ferarum natura non est illa quidem depravata mala disciplina, sed natura sua. title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_literature() function really “silly” whimsical ipsum generators; grabs excerpts public domain classic literature like Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, . Users can opt paragraph list tags, don’t expect complicated elements . swiftness, absolute method, Van Helsing performed operation. transfusion went something like life seemed come back poor Lucy’s cheeks, Arthur’s growing pallor joy face seemed absolutely shine. bit began grow anxious, loss blood telling Arthur, strong man . gave idea terrible strain Lucy’s system must undergone weakened Arthur partially restored . Professor’s face set, stood watch hand eyes fixed now patient now Arthur. hear heart beat. Presently said soft voice: “stir instant. enough. attend ; look .” see much Arthur weakened. dressed wound took arm bring away, Van Helsing spoke without turning round–man seems eyes back head:– “brave lover, think, deserve another kiss, shall presently.” now finished operation, adjusted pillow patient’s head. narrow black velvet band seems always wear round throat, buckled old diamond buckle lover given , dragged little , showed red mark throat. Arthur notice , hear deep hiss indrawn breath one Van Helsing’s ways betraying emotion. said nothing moment, turned , saying: “Now take brave young lover, give port wine, let lie . must go home rest, sleep much eat much, may recruited given love. must stay . Hold! moment. may take , sir, anxious result. bring ways operation successful. saved life time, can go home rest easy mind can . shall tell well; shall love none less done. Good-bye.” Arthur gone went back room. Lucy sleeping gently, breathing stronger; see counterpane move breast heaved. bedside sat Van Helsing, looking intently. velvet band covered red mark. asked Professor whisper:–
code: example_lit <-   lipsum_literature(     n = 3L,     tag = "p", # add p tags     source = "dracula"   ) # take from dracula

code: lipsum_hipster(   n_paras = 5L,   n_sentences = NULL,   type = c("hipster-centric", "hipster-latin"),   start_with_lorem = TRUE )

title: Obtain hipster placeholder text using the Hipster Ipsum API — lipsum_hipster
text: https://hipsum.co/

title: Obtain hipster placeholder text using the Hipster Ipsum API — lipsum_hipster
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. n_sentences Integer, optional. number sentences generate. Overrides n_paras. type Character. One "hipster-centric" hipster words , "hipster-latin" hipster mixed random lorem ipsum words. Defaults "hipster-centric". start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, starts first paragraph 'baby'. Defaults TRUE.

what:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — lipsum_literature
title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — lipsum_literature
text: Choose passages copyright-free literature courtesy Gutenberg Project.

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — lipsum_literature
code: lipsum_literature(n = NULL, tag = NULL, source = NULL)

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — lipsum_literature
text: https://litipsum.com/

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — lipsum_literature
text: n Integer, optional. number paragraphs generate. default, NULL, generates one "page" text source. tag Character, optional. One "p" "li", renders paragraphs p li tags, respectively. source Character, optional. book take placeholder text. One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
code: lipsum_loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
code: lipsum_markdown(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.

what: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — lipsum_metaphor

code: lipsum_metaphor(n_paras = 2L, n_sentences = 4L, p = FALSE)

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — lipsum_metaphor
text: http://metaphorpsum.com/

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — lipsum_metaphor
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 2. n_sentences Integer. number sentences generate per paragraph. Defaults 4. p Logical. TRUE, wraps paragraphs paragraph tags. Defaults FALSE.

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — lipsum_rick
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 2. n_sentences Integer. number sentences generate per paragraph. Defaults 4.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Seazon API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
code: lipsum_seazon(   latin = TRUE,   start_with_lorem = TRUE,   use_periods = TRUE,   use_sentence_case = TRUE,   p = TRUE,   use_double_spaces = FALSE,   random_numbers = FALSE,   random_latin = TRUE,   min_letters = 2L,   max_letters = 9L,   min_words = 45L,   max_words = 85L,   min_paras = 3L,   max_paras = 4L )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: http://www.seazon.org/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: latin Logical. TRUE, generates Latin text. Otherwise generates random text. Defaults TRUE. start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, begins text 'Lorem Ipsum'. Defaults TRUE. use_periods Logical. TRUE, uses periods. Defaults TRUE. use_sentence_case Logical. TRUE, begins sentence upper case character. Defaults TRUE. p Logical. TRUE, wraps text paragraph tags. Defaults TRUE. use_double_spaces Logical. TRUE, puts double spaces sentence. Defaults FALSE. random_numbers Logical. TRUE, adds random numbers 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. random_latin Logical. TRUE, makes random text latin-like 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. min_letters, max_letters Minimum/maximum numbers letters word, 'latin = FALSE'. min_words, max_words Minimum/maximum paragraph word count. min_paras, max_paras Minimum/maximum number paragraphs.#'

title: lipsum (development version)
text: Added 4 practical lorem ipsum generators. Added several whimsical lorem ipsum generators. Powered curl , relevant, jsonlite.
